title: Pomegranate Mojito

ingredients.content: 8 sprigs fresh mint, leaves only (approx. 30), plus extra to garnish
10 oz soda water (approx. 2.5 oz per glass)

preparations.content: Place sugar into mixing bowl and grind <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>.
Add ice cubes and crush <b>15 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add lime juice and mint leaves and chop <b>2 sec/î€ƒ/speed 4<b>.

Add rum, pomegranate liqueur and juice and mix <b>20 sec/speed 1<b>. Pour into four glasses, add 2 tsp of pomegranate arils/seeds into each glass, then finish off with soda or tonic water, garnish with mint leaves or with a few slices of lime.

hintsAndTricks: Arils/seeds can be omitted if pomegranate is out of season.
